hi pirumyan ...
   i am from india....and i have just registered to make a comment or u can call it a request....i saw ur world literature torrent....i am new here....kudos to you for the effort ...can u please somehow upload a book called english august ...written by upamanyu chtterjee of india....its story of an indian administrator ..i have tried everywhere but couldn't get it....will really appreciate ur gesture...!!!! plz......witing for ur response ....KAIVALYA
Is this the trial version? because it says I need to purchase in 7 days.

Thanks for registering, I will try to find that book.

No it is not a trial, i have it on my computer for 8 months and it works with out a problem.
